recommendations.excerpt: At the Supreme Court, nothing is as usual this term after the leak of Justice Samuel Alito’s draft opinion in the biggest abortion case in nearly a half-century.

recommendations.title: The Classified Case of the Pro Wrestler Who Helped Beat the Nazis
recommendations.excerpt: Man Mountain Dean was Hulk Hogan before Hulk Hogan. He leapt to the big screen before it was the sporting standard. And for his final act? He worked in the shadows to topple Hitler.

recommendations.title: No, You’re Not Going Crazy - Package Sizes Are Shrinking
recommendations.excerpt: It’s the inflation you’re not supposed to see. From toilet paper to yogurt and coffee to corn chips, manufacturers are quietly shrinking package sizes without lowering prices. It’s dubbed “shrinkflation,” and it’s accelerating worldwide.

recommendations.excerpt: “The paradoxical effect of losing a loved one is that their sudden absence can become a feverish comment on that which remains… a luminous super-presence.”

recommendations.title: Lakota elders helped a white man preserve their language. Then he tried to sell it back to them.
recommendations.excerpt: “No matter how it was collected, where it was collected, when it was collected, our language belongs to us," said Ray Taken Alive, a Lakota teacher.
